properties.name: richtext_label_5
properties.text: NOTE: Hi-Vis to be worn at all times. Reflective Tape in dim /dark conditions.
properties.textTranslation: NOTE: Hi-Vis to be worn at all times. Reflective Tape in dim /dark conditions.

properties.name: Question1
properties.title: I have notified site contact of my presence and I have signed in (where required).

properties.name: Question2
properties.title: I have been inducted as required by the site.

properties.name: Question3
properties.title: The weather and lighting is adequate to perform the task.

properties.name: Question4
properties.title: I have inspected my work area for slip & trip hazards.

properties.name: Question5
properties.title: I have ensured nothing may fall on me or strike me.

properties.name: Question6
properties.title: I can access the plant / equipment safely and I have ensured I am not at risk of falling from any height above 1 metre.

properties.name: Question7
properties.title: I have ensured I cannot be caught in, on or between anything.

properties.name: Question8
properties.title: I have ensured I will not strain or over exert myself.

properties.name: Question9
properties.title: I have ensured I cannot come into contact with (bio) hazardous substances.

properties.name: Question10
properties.title: I have communicated to surrounding personnel any risks and cordoned / barricaded the work area as required.

properties.name: Question11
properties.title: I have inspected my work area for underground & overhead hazards.

properties.name: Question12
properties.title: I have removed all vandal covers.

properties.name: Question13
properties.title: I have conducted a pre-operational inspection and the machine is safe for operation.

properties.name: Question14
properties.title: I can complete the task safely on my own.

properties.name: Label 1
properties.text: Do I Feel Safe? I would rate the risk of this task as: (Refer Risk Matrix)
properties.textTranslation: Do I Feel Safe? I would rate the risk of this task as: (Refer Risk Matrix)

properties.name: richtext_label_6
properties.text: All tasks rated Significant or above must complete a JSEA or SWMS.
properties.textTranslation: All tasks rated Significant or above must complete a JSEA or SWMS.
